body:
This PR fixes a UB error in ArgsManager::ParseParameters that was thrown while compiling binaries of an unrelated PR https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/18901

```shell
SUMMARY: UndefinedBehaviorSanitizer: nullptr-with-nonzero-offset /usr/bin/../lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/9/../../../../include/c++/9/bits/basic_string.h:527:69 in 
MS: 0 ; base unit: 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000
0x41,0x2f,0xd9,0x5d,
A/\xd9]
artifact_prefix='./'; Test unit written to ./crash-53c396395f172569c4ca41b9f6d528fc7c8ef42e
Base64: QS/ZXQ==
```

```shell
#1 0x563d49d8bbf0 in ArgsManager::ParseParameters(int, char const* const*, std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >&) /home/travis/build/bitcoin/bitcoin/ci/scratch/build/bitcoin-x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/src/util/system.cpp:288:21
```

The problem is located in `util/system.cpp`, [line 288](https://github.com/brakmic/bitcoin/blob/master/src/util/system.cpp#L288):

```cpp
for (int i = 1; i < argc; i++) {
    std::string key(argv[i]);
```

A check for possible **nullptr**'s is missing.

With changed code the system.cpp fuzzer output looks like this:

title: util: fix UB error in ArgsManager::ParseParameters
